[http://www.boeing.com/ Boeing.com] |intl = yes }} The 'Boeing Company' ( ) ()
is an American multinational aerospace and defense corporation. Founded in 1916
by William E. Boeing in Seattle, Washington, the company has expanded over the
years, and merged with McDonnell Douglas in 1997. Boeing moved its corporate
headquarters from Seattle to Chicago, Illinois, in 2001.
Boeing is made up of multiple business units, which are Boeing Commercial
Airplanes (BCA); Boeing Defense, Space & Security (BDS); Engineering, Operations
& Technology; Boeing Capital; and Boeing Shared Services Group.

Boeing is among the largest global aircraft manufacturers, and the second
largest aerospace and defense contractor in the world based on defense-related
revenue from 2011. [http://special.defensenews.com/top-
100/charts/rank_2011.php "Defense News Top 100 for 2011"]. [[Defense News]],
June 21, 2012. The company is the largest exporter by value in the U.S., [http://www.usatoday.com/money/industries/manufacturing/2009-03-25-
boeing-recession_N.htm "Boeing says it's flying high despite recession"]. USA
Today, March 27, 2009. and its stock is a component of the Dow Jones
Industrial Average.
